title: 2000 Bank of the West Classic – Singles
text:
<a href="Lindsay%20Davenport">Lindsay Davenport</a> was the defending champion, but lost in the final against <a href="Venus%20Williams">Venus Williams</a> in their third consecutive final at this tournament. The score was 6–1, 6–4.
Seeds.
The first four <a href="tennis%20terminology%23S">seeds</a> received a <a href="tennis%20terminology%23B">bye</a> into the second round.
